resources.string: Let\'s Start coding by signing\nin Coders Hub.

This application has been developed by Atharva Sunil Karande, Gaurav Valmik Sonawane, Ninad Sunil Apte and Prajwal Vijay Mate, who are the students of "Indian Institute of Information and Technology, Pune".
			The main motivation behind the idea of developing “ Coder’s Hub ” is to fulfil the need of the users that surf over the internet to find tools that can be used for improving their knowledge towards coding. 
			In Coder’s Hub we provide quizzes and interview related questions that are required for testing one’s coding skills.These quizzes come in the form of Multiple Choice Questions. The exciting part is that you are being awarded coins for every correct answer! These coins can be redeemed by purchasing new quizzes. So, no quiz is free!
			The main motive behind this concept is to avoid users submitting answers without giving it sufficient time.
By implementing the concepts of Android Studio, Firebase and Java, we believe that the application can be beneficial for users trying to improve their skills as well as knowledge towards Computer Science.
